	We are looking for a creative, results-driven Social Media Manager to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing social media strategies that increase brand awareness, engagement, and lead generation across all relevant channels.

Key Responsibilities


	Develop, implement, and manage social media strategies aligned with company goals.

	Schedule, post, and monitor content across platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, TikTok, and YouTube.
	Grow and manage the company&rsquo;s social media communities, responding to comments and messages promptly.
	Collaborate with marketing, design, and sales teams to support campaigns and promotions.
	Monitor social media metrics, analyze performance, and prepare regular reports with actionable insights.
	Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends, tools, and best practices.
	Manage social media advertising campaigns (optional, if applicable).

	Analytics &amp; Performance Tracking: Experienced in using tools like Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, or Ahrefs to monitor website performance, analyze traffic patterns, and adjust strategies for maximum results.
	Technical SEO Awareness: Knowledge of site structure, URL optimization, page speed, mobile-friendliness, and other technical factors that influence search rankings.


What We Offer


	Salary: N200,000 - N300,000 / Month&nbsp;and benefits package.
	Opportunity to work in a collaborative and innovative environment.
	Career growth and professional development opportunities.

Social Media Manager Job at Aspom Travel Agency




        
    

        
        Aspom Travel Agency was founded on the 2nd of February, 2012 and has remained at the top of its game providing visa assistants, hotels, holiday packages, tours and flight deals to her clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location: Agungi, Lekki - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Position Overview
     

            
    




	We are looking for a creative, results-driven Social Media Manager to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing social media strategies that increase brand awareness, engagement, and lead generation across all relevant channels.
	This role requires a combination of creativity, analytical skills, and a deep understanding of current social media trends.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop, implement, and manage social media strategies aligned with company goals.
	Create engaging, high-quality content (graphics, videos, captions) tailored to each platform.
	Schedule, post, and monitor content across platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, TikTok, and YouTube.
	Grow and manage the company’s social media communities, responding to comments and messages promptly.
	Collaborate with marketing, design, and sales teams to support campaigns and promotions.
	Monitor social media metrics, analyze performance, and prepare regular reports with actionable insights.
	Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends, tools, and best practices.
	Manage social media advertising campaigns (optional, if applicable).


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
	Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role.
	Strong knowledge of social media platforms, trends, and analytics tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer, Meta Business Suite).
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box.
	Strong organizational skills and ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
	Knowledge of graphic design and video editing tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Creative Suite) is a plus.


SEO Skills & Competency Description:


	Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Proven ability to optimize website content and social media posts to improve organic search visibility and drive traffic. Skilled in keyword research, on-page SEO, meta descriptions, header tags, and internal linking strategies.
	Content Optimization: Able to create SEO-friendly content that aligns with target audience interests while adhering to best practices for search engines.
	Analytics & Performance Tracking: Experienced in using tools like Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, or Ahrefs to monitor website performance, analyze traffic patterns, and adjust strategies for maximum results.
	Technical SEO Awareness: Knowledge of site structure, URL optimization, page speed, mobile-friendliness, and other technical factors that influence search rankings.


What We Offer


	Salary: N200,000 - N300,000 / Month and benefits package.
	Opportunity to work in a collaborative and innovative environment.
	Career growth and professional development opportunities.

  "description": "Modern Lottery is a lottery and gaming company which is into the number lottery game. It is a company that just come into Nigeria and has been in existence in Cambodia before coming to Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Allen, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Serves as the first point of contact for customers, providing assistance, resolving issues, and delivering a positive customer experience.


Key Responsibilities


	Attend to customer inquiries in person, via phone, email, or social media.
	Provide accurate information about company products/services.
	Resolve complaints professionally and escalate issues when needed.
	Maintain customer records and update databases.
	Ensure a positive and friendly customer experience.
	Prepare daily or weekly customer service reports.


Skills &amp; Requirements


	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to handle pressure and remain calm.
	Good problem-solving skills.
	Computer literacy (Microsoft Office, email systems).
